text: Ara taderake yekhane pabe hatya karabe [1] ebam ye sthana theke tara tomaderake bahiskara kareche tomara'o se sthana theke taderake bahiskara karabe. Ara phetâ€Œna hatyara ceye'o gurutara [2]. Ara masajidula haramera kache tomara tadera sathe yud'dha karabe na [3] ye paryanta na tara sekhane tomadera sathe yud'dha kare. Atahpara yadi tara tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha kare tabe tomara taderake hatya karabe, eta'i kapheradera parinama
